short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark History Manager PRO & share helper

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing advanced bookmark and history management capabilities and search, along with innovative sharing features so you can share your bookmarks and history with others and quickly access them via your mobile phone.

Key Features:

1. Advanced Bookmark Management
- Advanced search and filtering capabilities
- Intelligent bookmark organization and categorization
- Quick access to frequently visited sites
- Customizable bookmark collections
- Favicon support for visual recognition
- Seamless integration with Chrome's native bookmarking system

2. Enhanced History Management
- Comprehensive browsing history management
- Advanced search and filtering capabilities
- Allow adding history items to bookmarks
- Top sites tracking for quick access

3. Smart Link Management & Sharing
- Automatic link description extraction from web pages
- Provide a QR code for each link so you can scan it quickly on your mobile phone
